content.text: table is designed to store metadata about different attribute types within a billing system. Each record in this table represents a specific option for an attribute type, providing both short and detailed descriptions, as well as additional metadata such as tooltips. The table is crucial for defining and managing the various attribute options that can be associated with billing entities, likely facilitating dynamic configuration and extensibility of billing attributes.
The complexity level of this table is considered medium due to the following factors:
It has a straightforward structure with a primary key and several descriptive fields.
It includes a foreign key relationship, which adds a layer of complexity.
The presence of default values and non-null constraints requires careful data management.

: This table is part of a billing system, used to define and manage attribute options that can be applied to billing entities. It supports dynamic configuration by allowing administrators to add or modify attribute options without altering the core system.
Defining new attribute options for billing entities.
Providing descriptions and tooltips for user interfaces to enhance usability.
Associating attribute options with specific attribute types for flexible billing configurations.
